summary: The agent report is excellent, accurately identifying root causes and providing logical reasoning and actionable fixes, with minor omissions in causal chain and metric precision.

dimensions.name: Root Cause Accuracy
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified the root causes related to CM/PowerHal/DDR voting and MMDVFS OPP3.

dimensions.name: Causal Chain Completeness
dimensions.explanation: The agent captured most causal links but did not mention SW_REQ2/SW_REQ3 voting mechanisms.

dimensions.name: Metric Precision
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified most metrics but missed some specific CPU frequencies.

dimensions.name: Reasoning Quality
dimensions.explanation: The diagnostic reasoning is logical and correctly identifies MMDVFS as a cause.

dimensions.name: Actionability
dimensions.explanation: The suggested fixes are practical and relevant to the identified issues.
